snippet: ARLEN--Alice. The board of the Alicia Patterson Foundation celebrates the exceptional life of Alice Arlen, former director, board member and president emeritus. She supported important journalism in all facets of her spirited life. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ARLEN--Alice. The board of the Alicia Patterson Foundation celebrates the exceptional life of Alice Arlen, former director, board member and president emeritus. She supported important journalism in all facets of her spirited life. 1/3
